name: Compass (nevaherosa)
description:
Ben Bender is an explorer in the 1700’s, fakes his identity and ends up on the shore of Atlantis, leading to his journey of becoming a spy.

  • Ben Bender is a con-artist portraying King Tom Bender son. 
  • He must keep his identity sealed.
  • Your choices matter inside the game of "Compass."
  • Players must  make certain decisions.
  • The decisions will affect the game play and outcome.
  • Certain Combat battle are inevitable.
